duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct and coordinate general administration activities and personnel to support the Sales Team.
Provide customer service, order management, liaising with warehouse operations and coordinating outbound freight process.
Review orders for timely and accurate processing in compliance with company guidelines.
Work with Accounting on collection efforts, particularly the COD customers.
Set up price levels as requested by the Sales Team and execute promos, BOGOs, and plus-outs.
Maintain customer database and approve pick-up and credit requests within the limits of authority.
Develop policies, procedures, and tools for the Customer Service Team and document workflow.
Request rates from 3rd party logistic companies and calculate weight of order for bill of lading.
Communicate freight specifications to customers and complete documentation packet (BOL, invoices, Shipping manifest) prior to load pick-up.
Handle EDI inputting for required accounts and prepare detailed instructions regarding sales orders and 3PL procedures.
Support the administration needs of the Director, Sales & Marketing and plan and schedule employee training.
Recruit, evaluate, discipline, and terminate employees and oversee general administration programs and processes.

education_certification.credential: Post-Secondary Education in a Sales and/or Administration field
